total_slides.description: Total number of pages/slides in the PDF

main_deck_slides.description: Number of slides before the appendix starts

appendix_slides.description: Number of slides in the appendix section

pages.description: Per-slide data. Each page object contains ONLY information visibly present on THAT specific slide.

visual_slide_number.description: One-indexed slide number as a human would count (first slide = 1).

is_appendix.description: True if this slide is visually identified as an appendix slide. Appendix indicators: smaller font, 'Appendix' label, reference-style content, footnotes/citations, backup data sections, slides after a clear 'Thank You' or closing slide.

detailed_breakdown.description: Comprehensive visual analysis of THIS slide only. Include ALL key facts, statements, and observations. Describe everything visible: all text in graphics, numbers, charts, tables, images, design elements, layout, visual hierarchy. Vision-first analysis. CRITICAL: Do not describe or reference content from other slides. Only describe what you see on this exact slide.

statement.description: The core problem statement as written on THIS slide

who_affected.description: Who experiences this problem as stated on THIS slide

frequency_or_impact.description: How often or how severely as stated on THIS slide (e.g., 'daily', '$81B annual loss')

situation_context.description: When/where the problem occurs as stated on THIS slide

problem_statement.description: ONLY populate if a problem statement is VISIBLY PRESENT on THIS specific slide. Look for: 'The Problem', pain points, customer issues, market gaps. Leave empty if not present on this slide.

links.description: URLs and hyperlinks visible on THIS slide only. Do not include regular text.

name.description: Full name of team member as shown on THIS slide

role.description: Job title or role visible on THIS slide

experience.description: Experience description visible on THIS slide

companies.description: Company names visible on THIS slide in relation to this person

type.description: Type of team member as indicated on THIS slide

team_members.description: ONLY populate if team member information is VISIBLY PRESENT on THIS specific slide. Look for: names, roles, headshots, bios, company logos. Leave empty if not present on this slide.

tam.description: Total Addressable Market value if VISIBLE on THIS slide

sam.description: Serviceable Addressable Market value if VISIBLE on THIS slide

som.description: Serviceable Obtainable Market value if VISIBLE on THIS slide

methodology.description: Market sizing methodology if VISIBLE on THIS slide (e.g., 'top-down', 'bottom-up')

sources.description: Data sources if VISIBLE on THIS slide

year.description: Timeframe for market data if VISIBLE on THIS slide

market_sizing.description: ONLY populate if market sizing data is VISIBLY PRESENT on THIS specific slide. Look for TAM/SAM/SOM labels or market value numbers. Leave empty if not present on this slide. Do not carry forward from previous slides.

name.description: Competitor name as shown on THIS slide

type.description: Competitor type as indicated or inferred on THIS slide

description.description: Competitor description visible on THIS slide

competitors.description: ONLY populate if competitor information is VISIBLY PRESENT on THIS specific slide. Look for: company names in comparison tables, matrices, or competitive landscape sections. IMPORTANT: Extract ALL competitor names shown in tables, charts, or comparisons - do not leave this empty if competitors are visible. Leave empty only if genuinely not present on this slide.

metric.description: Metric name as shown on THIS slide (e.g., 'Customers', 'MRR', 'Revenue')

value.description: Metric value as shown on THIS slide (include units)

date.description: Date/period for this metric if shown on THIS slide (e.g., 'Q1 2024', 'Year 1')

context.description: Additional context visible on THIS slide (e.g., 'Target', 'Actual', 'Projected')

traction_metrics.description: ONLY populate if traction metrics are VISIBLY PRESENT on THIS specific slide. Look for: current metrics (revenue, users, customers), target metrics (goals), growth rates. IMPORTANT: Extract from roadmaps, timelines, and goal statements - if you see 'Q1: 30 Customers' or '$39K Target MRR', extract these as metrics. Leave empty only if genuinely not present on this slide.

timeframe.description: Operating plan timeframe visible on THIS slide (e.g., 'Year 1', '12-18 months')

milestone.description: Milestone description visible on THIS slide

timeframe.description: When this milestone is targeted on THIS slide (e.g., 'Q1', 'Month 6')

milestones.description: Specific milestones visible on THIS slide

operating_plan.description: ONLY populate if operating plan or roadmap is VISIBLY PRESENT on THIS specific slide. Look for: timelines, roadmaps, quarterly goals, milestone charts. IMPORTANT: This is separate from use_of_funds - extract timeline-based goals here. Leave empty if not present on this slide.

total_raise.description: Total raise amount if VISIBLE on THIS slide

raise_structure.description: Raise structure type if VISIBLE on THIS slide (e.g., 'Pre-Seed', 'Series A', 'SAFE')

timeframe.description: Fund duration if VISIBLE on THIS slide (e.g., '12-18 Month Runway')

category.description: Spending category visible on THIS slide

description.description: Category description visible on THIS slide

allocation.description: Fund allocation breakdown visible on THIS slide

milestone.description: Funding milestone text visible on THIS slide

timeframe.description: Milestone timeframe visible on THIS slide

metric.description: Milestone metric visible on THIS slide

milestones.description: Funding-specific milestones visible on THIS slide (e.g., revenue goals tied to raising next round)

use_of_funds.description: ONLY populate if use of funds information is VISIBLY PRESENT on THIS specific slide. Look for: raise amounts, spending breakdowns, pie charts, funding roadmaps. This is for FINANCIAL allocation, not product roadmap. Leave empty if not present on this slide. Do not carry forward from previous slides.

name.description: Contact name if VISIBLE on THIS slide

role.description: Contact role if VISIBLE on THIS slide

email.description: Email address if VISIBLE on THIS slide

phone.description: Phone number if VISIBLE on THIS slide

linkedin.description: LinkedIn URL if VISIBLE on THIS slide

contact_info.description: ONLY populate if contact information is VISIBLY PRESENT on THIS specific slide. Leave empty if not present on this slide. Do not carry forward from previous slides.
